item.description:
Yes, it's time for another night of bars.

All yes RSVPs will be e-mailed the details of the evening through the meetup.com site. Please make sure you check your e-mails the afternoon of the event at the latest.

If you the meetup is maxed out, and you still want to meet with the group on Saturday night, you may still do so at McFadden's at 10pm. I worked out a deal with them that if you show up before 10:30pm, you do not have to pay cover or wait in line. Just mention Newcomers at the door.
item.name: BARS
